summary: SAFE PLUS STEERING STABILIZER MODEL 41-230 SERIAL NO 05005817 INSTALLED ON MY 1998 FREIGHTLINER/ALLEGRO BUS RV SUDDENLY BEGAN SEVERE BINDING WHICH REPEATEDLY FROZE THE STEERING SYSTEM UNTIL IT RELEASED WITH A LOUD SNAP, CAUSING THE STEERING TO "JUMP" DANGEROUSLY, UNPREDICTABLY AND UNCONTROLLABLY.  FORTUNATELY FOR ME AND MY FAMILY, THE ONSET OCCURRED ON A SERVICE ROAD GOING TO OUR STORAGE LOT.  HAD THIS HAPPENED ON THE HIGHWAY IT WOULD HAVE BEEN CERTAIN DISASTER. I'VE BEEN DRIVING FOR 45 YEARS AND NOTHING EXCITES ME; THIS CERTAINLY DID. THIS WAS A DISASTROUS FAILURE MODE WHICH RENDERED THE RV STEERING UNCONTROLLABLE EVEN AT 10 MPH.    *JB

CHEV P30012 CHASIS UNDER A TIFFIN(ALLEGRO BUS)MOTOR HOME.  WIPER MOTOR. UNABLE TO TURN OFF WIPERS OR TO USE THE INTERMITTENT FEATURE.  WIPERS ONLY WORK ON HIGH AND LOW SPEED.  MUST UNPLUG THE WIPERS FROM THE MOTOR TO CAUSE WIPERS CEASE MOTION.*JB
WHEN MAGIC CHEF  OVEN IS BEING USED  3 TOP BURNERS SEIZED WHILE COOKING MEALS. HAD TO RUN OUTSIDE THE RV AND SHUT PROPANE SOURCE OFF.   DEALER HAS REPLACED  OVEN/STOVE COMBINATION.  *AK

WATER TANK, WHICH HOLDS 350 POUNDS OF WATER, IS LOCATED RIGHT IN FRONT OF THE REAR BUMPER. ALMOS THAD A SERIOUS ACCIDENTDRIVING THE MOTOR HOME WITH A FULL TANK OF WATER, ON A WINDY DAY WHEN VEHICLE WA SPASSED BY A SEMI-TRUCK. HAD TO PULL OFF THE ROAD AND DUMP ALL OF THE WATER FROM THE TANK.
